name: 20 Minute Cake
author: Shirley Drury
instructions: Sift sugar and flour together. Set aside. Mix oleo, cocoa, and water in saucepan. Bring to a rapid boil. Then pour over sugar and flour mixture and stir until blended. Add remaining ingredients and mix well. Pour into greased 11 x 16 inch pan. Bake 20 minutes at 400Â°. Begin making icing 5 minutes before cake is done.
